Node.definition: = action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with suffering and lack of wisdom

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity
literally: to cause to spread out; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans or objects to divide themselves and move into many different directions
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= hot glowing body of fire (אֵשׁ) ≈ poetic
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance

= location; ◄ in the east; ► place where God planted the garden in which he placed the first man and woman, until they were sent away; often used to denote the garden itself; ≈ associated with joy, fertility, and prosperity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye
= horse; ► primarily used for soldiers to ride on, but also for agricultural purposes
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= action with which humans or animals move in a quick and light or lively way
= hot glowing body of fire

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

= dry grass like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned
= state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

Node.gloss: to tremble|to be distressed|to be in anguish
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience strong fear and distress, ◄ compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing, and trembling
= process by which people have a reduced blood flow in the skin causing a lighter complexion, ◄ as a result of fear
= reddish glow on one's face; ≈ associated with health and well being
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which swarms of locusts deviate from the course they have taken
= the course that one follows, whether it is on an actual road or path or not

Node.gloss: a man ... his brother > one ... each other
Node.definition: = expression denoting a situation in which two people or objects that are regarded as masculine are involved in a reciprocal event
= action by which someone knocks or pushes against one's neighbor while marching forward
= relational indicating that the event in focus is performed by each participant present
literally: highway; hence: = the direction in which humans or animals move forward
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else
= tool designed to inflict bodily harm, used in armed conflicts
meaning unsure; possibly: = action by which a swarm of insects moves forward heedless of whatever opposition comes their way
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = process by which an event comes to a standstill because someone or something makes it impossible to continue

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= process by which animals move forward at great speed and with aggressive intent

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else

= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= one of the celestial bodies which govern time, seasons and other events on earth, marked by a white and cold light and seen by night
= process by which celestial bodyies stop producing or reflecting light

= celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war
= action by which someone brings an event to an end
= process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: a camp; hence: = a relatively large group of people, such as nomads or soldiers, moving from one camping place to another
= state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= state in which humans, deities, places and activities have qualities that inspire fear in others

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
literally: to contain; hence: = state in which humans are able to handle or deal with a situation

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
particle linking an event to a participant; = relation indicating that event X is focused on object Y
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

= mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include wailing (ילל) tearing one's clothes, putting on sackcloth (שַׂק) covering oneself with dust or ashes, fasting (צום) or eating specific food, cutting oneself (גדד) shaving one's head (קרח) covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

Node.gloss: to tear|to rend|to cut|to rip|to split
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= generic designation for any article of clothing
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which deities are favorably disposed to someone, or of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people, and acting accordingly
= state in which deities feel compassion for humans, ► which is usually translated into action
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: long of nostrils, long of breath; hence: = pertaining to not being given to anger
literally: long of nostrils; hence: = ability to restrain oneself from expressing one's displeasure; ≈ regarded as wisdom
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= action by which humans pour out a liquid, such as wine (יַיִן) oil (שֶׁמֶן) or even blood (דָּם) before a deity ► as a sacrifice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to convoke (a holy event)|to declare (a holy event)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans call their community together for an event with a religious character, such as worship, fasting, or a holy war

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities make a public announcement
= state in which a large group of people has come together for a religious purpose
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= causative action by where humans cause other humans or objects to be ready to be in the presence of a deity by going through special rituals
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose
= a person who is nearing the end of a relatively long life; ≈ regarded as wise, worthy of respect, and an asset to the community
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= a person of a young age, usually before puberty
= a child that is still drinking milk from its mother's breasts
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= man who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
= area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
= temporary construction made of cloth; ► erected for a newly married couple
= the area separating two or mores locations
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion
= an individual, nation, or land that is affected by efforts from others to arouse an emotion of shame in them ◄ by words or actions

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a reference to an unknown location, but focused on the question whether an object actually exists at all, rather than with a specific location in mind
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to be zealous|to be wrought up|to be concerned for
Node.definition: = process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to be concerned for|to have pity on|to show mercy|to spare
Node.definition: = process by which humans or deities experience an emotion of affection for a particular object or state of event; ► resulting in unwillingness to see that object come to harm or that event to be obstructed
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans or deities send an object to (other) humans, usually through the mediation of a messenger

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness
= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an individual, nation, or land that is affected by efforts from others to arouse an emotion of shame in them ◄ by words or actions

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a person or people group originating from the north

Node.gloss: to drive out|to cast out|to disperse
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to leave their place or position using force

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= land in which there is a lack of water or rainfall, ► resulting in lack of vegetation and other desert like conditions; ≈ associated with thirst and hardship

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them
literally: the eastern sea; hence: = Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
literally: the sea behind; hence: = Mediterranean Sea
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which an activity increases in intensity
= process by which dead animals, plants, or wounds give off a foul odor; ≈ considered repulsive
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which an activity increases in intensity
= state in which an object emits a strong, offensive odor ◄ as of a dead body
= causative process by which a deity causes events to increase in intensity

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= causative process by which a deity causes events to increase in intensity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to humans (אָדָם) birds (עֹוף) reptiles (רֶמֶשׂ) insects (שֶׁרֶץ) and fish (דָּג)

Node.gloss: to be covered with vegetation|to become green
Node.definition: = process by which land develops green vegetation
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which plants or trees (or the area where they grow) produces branches or fruit
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= objects that people possess in a relatively large quantity; ≈ greatly valued by the owner, strongly coveted by other people, and a cause of status

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= rain that falls from mid October until early November; ► moistens the soil and makes it soft to facilitate plowing and sowing; ≈ regarded as a blessing from YHWH

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to lower|to let down|to take down|to bring down|to take off (ornaments)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects to move from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= water that has fallen as rain
= rain that falls from mid October until early November; ► moistens the soil and makes it soft to facilitate plowing and sowing; ≈ regarded as a blessing from YHWH
= rain that falls during the first half of April, before the harvest; ► provides the moisture that is crucial for the grains to mature; ≈ regarded as a blessing from YHWH
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

= level, circular area about 7.5 to 12 meters in diameter, where people threshed their grain; usually located near the fields where the grain was grown, and if possible, in an elevated area that was exposed to the breeze
collective: = seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as the main ingredient for bread and related food products; ≈ regarded as an essential condition for life
= large container; ◄ normally hewn out of stone and part of a winepress; ► where the grape juice is collected

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness
= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= six legged, winged insect that is characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; insects of this type move in swarms at certain periods and migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times they live either solitary or in small groups; ◄ Acrididae family; ► normally eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, that may be eaten

term found primarily in poetic contexts: = six legged, winged insect that is characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; insects of this type move in swarms at certain periods and migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times they live either solitary or in small groups; ◄ Acrididae family; ► normally eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw
exact meaning unkown; probably: = juvenile form of locust (אַרְבֶּה)

= six legged, winged insect that is characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; insects of this type move in swarms at certain periods and migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times they live either solitary or in small groups; ◄ Acrididae family; ► normally eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, that may be eaten

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which deities commission one or more people to go to a certain individual or place to inflict punishment
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
